listing.listing_description: Rugged mountains, swaying palms and Instagram-worthy interiors create a stunning backdrop for a Desert Cities holiday at Casa La Quinta. The five bedrooms plus casita at this just-finished luxury home are perfect for a getaway with up to twelve friends or a warm-weather break with family, and a location within the confines of the La Quinta Resort is convenient to golf, the spa, shopping and much more.Take in the views of the red-rock mountains and lush green fairways from a private backyard designed to capture the quintessentially California experience of indoor-outdoor living. Spend sunny days in the pool or on the bocce court and yoga mats, then linger into the evenings around the barbecue, al-fresco dining area, firepit and hot tub.An indoor-outdoor bar links the villa’s terrace with its open-concept interiors, where you’ll find amenities from a satellite TV, Sonos sound system and Wi-Fi to a wine cooler to make entertaining easy. Details like beamed ceilings and woven baskets add warm natural texture to the chic sitting area, dining table and fully equipped kitchen in the great room.There are five bedrooms in the main house at this single-story vacation rental: two with California king beds and three with king beds, all with en-suite bathrooms. There’s also a casita with its own king bed and en-suite bathroom that could be used as a honeymoon-style retreat or a quieter space for in-laws.Thanks to its gated-community setting, Casa La Quinta is less than a 5-minute drive from the spa, golf courses and other amenities at La Quinta Resort. It’s also less than a 10-minute drive from shopping at the charming Old Town La Quinta and a short trip from world-famous local venues such as the Coachella festival grounds and the Indian Wells Tennis Garden.City ID # 765886Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This exceptional designer gem is nestled near the heart of Hollywood, just minutes from the Sunset Strip. Completely renovated in 2013, the historic home exudes the vintage style of mid-century Los Angeles, offering a unique yet quintessential experience of this incomparable world capital. With a superb design that gracefully melds exterior and interior living areas, the villa is ideal for entertaining guests or relishing private hours with loved-ones under the Southern California sky. Three bedrooms including a beautiful master suite can comfortably accommodate families or small groups of friends.The single-level home is built around an ample pool terrace in consummate Hollywood style. Step into the scintillating water for a refreshing soak, and relish alfresco meals from the barbeque. Sip refreshments in the canopied lounge area as the sunset illuminates the hills. In the evening, kindle the fire pit as you savor a local California wine, and crawl into the whirlpool spa for a nighttime soak.Ample windows and sliding glass doors infuse the home with an alfresco ambiance. The villa is superbly furnished with stylish modern design pieces and an extraordinary art collection, while its vaulted ceilings, beautiful wood dining table, and fireplace in the lounge lend a rustic accent. The kitchen features chef-grade appliances, lovely pendant lighting, and an ample island with breakfast bar.The villa's superb master suite opens directly to the pool terrace and enjoys plentiful natural light, with curtains to provide privacy. The vaulted ceiling of whitewashed wood shelters a king bed and ensuite bathroom with walk-in shower and a lovely soaking tub. The primary guest room includes a queen bed surrounded by beautiful artwork and design pieces, illuminated by ample windows; while the kid-friendly third bedroom has a double bed set within a charming niche.The villa's prime Hollywood location places you within easy reach of some of the finest destinations in Los Angeles, including the Grove, the Hollywood Bowl, the Sunset Strip, Universal Studios, and Santa Monica Beach and Pier. Bob Hope International Airport is just eight miles away, and LAX about twelve, making the villa a convenient choice for destination wedding guests or easy weekend escapes.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Registration number: HSR19-001258

listing.listing_description: A luxury suite within One Steamboat Place gives you exclusive privacy and world-class mountain lodge amenities just a minute's walk from Steamboat Gondola. Among the vacation rentals here, the three-bedroom Zen Mountain suite stands out for its stunning, Asian-inflected décor. It's ideal for families and friends seeking exquisite tranquility during a Rocky Mountain getaway.The luminous, open-plan living area features a lounge of supple leather furnishings surrounding the stone hearth. Here, you'll relax together after an adventurous day on the slopes, warming your feat by the wood-burning fireplace and watching your favorite movies on the mounted flat screen television. In the evening, you'll prepare hearty meals in the fully equipped kitchen, and share them at the carved-wood dining table for ten. Outside the living lounge, your private deck overlooks Steamboat and includes a Viking gas grill for barbeques in the alpine air. The suite also features a nicely sized office suite and high-speed WiFi.The bedrooms at Zen Mountain are beautiful sanctuaries. The master bedroom features a gorgeous wall of birch saplings behind the bed's headboard, bringing the spirit of the forest into your dreams. A deliciously soft leather armchair beside a nightstand of petrified wood faces the fireplace, and the ensuite bathroom includes stand-alone steam shower and jetted bathtub. The second room has a king bed and twin bunk beds with trundle, and an ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower and bathtub; while the third bedroom has a queen bed and ensuite bathroom with shower/tub combo.One Steamboat Place offers you the ideal location for relishing these world-class slopes, with the Steamboat Gondola literally steps from the front entrance. When you return in the evening, you'll enjoy access to the complex's world-class lodge amenities, including the outdoor heated swimming pool and hot tub, the classic Great Room, and the Little Tykes room for kids.The many delights of Steamboat and its environs are at your fingertips. Steamboat Springs Old Town and City Market are just a short drive away, as is Rolling Stone Ranch Golf Course. And for a truly restorative soak in the heart of nature, visit Strawberry Natural Hot Springs, just ten miles away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This spectacular penthouse is the crown jewel of Parkite on Main, a new complex of luxury residences located on Historic Main Street in Park City. Featuring perhaps the finest rooftop terrace in Park City, along with exquisite indoor living areas and a wonderful location just a short walk from Town Lift, this four-bedroom vacation rental is ideal for family ski vacations, alpine adventurers, and destination wedding guests seeking well-appointed privacy and total convenience in Utah's most famous locale.The interior living and dining areas are the perfect setting for unwinding after a day on the mountain. Enjoy evenings by the fireplace in lovely living room. Watch your favorite movies on the flat-screen TV in the cozy lounge. Prepare hearty meals in the fully equipped kitchen with breakfast bar, and gather around the beautiful dining table for memorable feasts. Large windows fill the villa's interior with alpine light, while the décor gives a tastefully contemporary take on classic chalet charm.The private outdoor spaces—4,000 square feet in all—are what separate this penthouse from the pack. Soak your body in the rooftop hot tub, savoring the panoramic views of the city and mountains. Absorb the alpine sun on elegant loungers, play a game of ping-pong, and relish warm drinks around the fire pit. Fire up the grill for Western barbeque, and gather around the alfresco table for a lovely meal. Heatlamps are on hand to keep you warm in winter.Parkite on Main boasts one of the finest locations in Park City. Literally steps from the shops and restaurants of Historic Main Street, you're also just a seven-minute walk from Town Lift and a five-minute drive to the base of Park City Mountain Resort. Deer Valley and Brighton are also a very short drive away. Golfers will enjoy proximity to Park City Golf Course.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Whether you’re in town for business and looking for a weekly rental or making a romantic getaway and need a house to escape to, Sanctuary in the Hills is a private oasis in the city. Tucked on a side street near Coldwater Canyon in Beverly Hills, this luxury vacation rental has a secluded outdoor space and canyon views, but is still close to shopping, dining, nightlife and more. The magazine-worthy, recently renovated interiors and four suite-style bedrooms pair modern French style with South African artwork to chic, memorable effect.Owned by a Hollywood event producer, the villa is well appointed to accommodate entertaining or private moments. Like a secret garden, a terrace made from reclaimed, century-old bricks is tucked behind the house, overlooking the canyon. Put your favorite music on the outdoor speakers and soak in the California sun from the lounge chairs, break for a swim in the pool, and fire up the barbecue before settling in to the al-fresco dining area. On cooler evenings, move indoors and have a drink from the wet bar or wine fridge or relax in front of the Apple TV. If you need to stay connected, the house has an office space and Wi-Fi.Sanctuary in the Hills combines the sprawling layout of a bungalow with the refinement of a mansion. Taking inspiration from the French modern aesthetic, Mediterranean style and the artwork of the owner’s native South Africa, the property feels at once contemporary and classic. The open-plan living spaces are unified by distressed Kentucky French oak floors, whitewashed ceiling beams and cool white walls, and wide windows that fill the rooms with light. A comfortable sitting area boasts cream-colored sofas and built-in bookcases, a thoughtful touch that’s echoed by the built-in banquette in the dining area. The fully equipped kitchen has both a practical breakfast bar and an on-trend monochromatic white look.Each of the villa’s four bedrooms has an en-suite bathroom. The master suite, which opens directly onto the pool terrace, has a king bed and walk-in closet. The other three bedrooms, one of which opens to the pool terrace as well, have queen beds. The same oak flooring and white walls create a serene feel in the bedrooms, while intricate tiles and unusual mirrors add interest to the spa-worthy bathrooms.Though this Beverly Hills villa feels miles away from the ordinary, it’s a short drive to downtown, West Hollywood and more. Treat yourself to shopping on Rodeo Drive, about 4 miles away, or The Grove, about 6 miles away, or experience the famed nightlife along the Sunset Strip, just over 4 miles away, and Hollywood Boulevard, 6.5 miles away. If you’re traveling with kids, take them to Universal Studios, about 6 miles away, or for a day on Santa Monica Beach or Venice Beach, about 13 and 14 miles away, respectively. The closest airport to Sanctuary in the Hills is Los Angeles International, a 16-mile drive from the villa.Copyright © 2016 Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Registration number: HSR19-003045

listing.listing_description: Get close to skiing, dining and shopping in the heart of the Steamboat mountain village at Guadalupe Mountain 613. This Steamboat Springs vacation rental is just an elevator ride from the gondola, coffee shops, restaurants and more. The villa’s open-plan layout and four spacious bedrooms make it the perfect place to entertain family or take a break with friends.Thanks to the villa’s location at One Steamboat Place, you’ll have access to shared amenities like a winter shuttle service, heated pool, hot tub, fitness center and games room. There’s even complimentary continental breakfast during ski season. You can also host a private cookout around the barbecue on the villa’s deck, or spend a quiet evening in around the flat-screen television and fireplace.An open-plan great room with a sitting area, dining area and fully equipped kitchen makes it easy to enjoy the luxury of time together. There’s plenty of room on the sofas and chairs around the stone fireplace for a catch-up chat or to catch the big game on television, and the dining area seats ten for après-ski feasts. Cooks will love the professional-grade appliances in the kitchen, and diners will appreciate the generous breakfast bar.The luxe ambience continues in the master bedroom, which is set apart in one corner of the villa and brings to mind a honeymoon suite with its king bed, gas fireplace and en-suite bathroom with hot tub. The unit has two other bedrooms with en-suite baths—one with a king bed and one with a queen—and one bedroom with two double beds and a hall bath.Guadalupe Mountain 613 is a 1-minute walk from the Steamboat gondola, about a 1-mile drive from the most convenient grocery store and, for warm-weather visitors, about 2 miles from the Rollingstone Ranch Golf Course. No matter what time of year your Colorado holiday, be sure to visit the town’s namesake hot springs for a splash in the family-friendly pools of Steamboat Springs Old Town or a soak amid the natural rock at Strawberry Park.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Mountain views, freshly groomed trails and a cozy fireside are all waiting at Farwell Mountain 607. This beautiful vacation rental at One Steamboat Place puts you close to the best of Steamboat Springs, from skiing to golf to the area’s namesake hot springs. Bring up to ten friends or family members to enjoy the resort amenities, open-plan living area and four suite-style bedrooms.One Steamboat Place provides a luxury setting for your ski holiday, golf getaway or outdoor adventure. Guests of the community are welcome at the shared heated pool, hot tub, fitness center, games room and wine tasting room. Take the winter shuttle service, which makes it easy to travel as a group, or let the kids play in the Little Tykes room while the grown-ups book a spa appointment. Whether you’ve spent the day chasing thrills or relaxing, make it a laid-back evening with a barbecue on the villa’s private balcony or a glass of wine in front of the flat-screen television and fireplace.The large, open-plan great room at Farwell Mountain 607 means no one feels left out of the fun. There’s a sitting area laid out around the television and fireplace, and a dining area where all ten of you can toast to a beginner’s first run down the bunny slope or just the fact that you’re all together. A breakfast bar provides additional seating and lets you chat to the cook while they work in the fully equipped gourmet kitchen.The villa’s four bedrooms, all with en-suite bathrooms, offer flexible accommodations for a variety of groups. There are two bedrooms with king beds, including a master suite with its own gas fireplace. The other two bedrooms each have twin-over-double bunk beds.Though Steamboat Springs has some of the best skiing in Colorado—and the villa is just a 5-minute walk from Steamboat Ski Resort—there’s plenty more to do besides cruise down the slopes. In the summer, you’re less than 2 miles from the scenic fairways of the Rollingstone Ranch golf course. No matter what the season, it’s worth visiting the nearby hot springs for a family-friendly splash at Old Town or a honeymoon-style soak and stargaze at Strawberry Park.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Business License Number: 001248Take a Colorado ski holiday to the next level at Cabin on the Ridge. A cabin in name only, this luxury property looks down over the Telluride area from a perch that’s only accessible by gondola. Its incredible amenities, both private and shared, and four bedrooms make it feel like a resort that’s just for you and your party of eight.The cabin has its own outdoor living areas with mountain views and a hot tub, barbecue, al-fresco dining for six and a fireplace. Inside, you’ll find a media room, cable TV, Sonos sound system, Wi-Fi and even an oxygen system, so you can breathe as easily as you would at lower altitudes. Guests are also welcome to use the heated pool, hot tub, exercise room and theater at the nearby Ridge Club.Rustic on the outside, elegant on the inside, this vacation rental truly elevates mountain-lodge style. It’s laid out around an open-concept great room whose picture windows perfectly frame the views and whose stone fireplace makes a cozy focal point. The living area and fully equipped kitchen are open to each other; sit down for special-occasion meals in the adjacent formal dining room.Cabin on the Ridge has three bedrooms with king beds, including a honeymoon-worthy master suite with its own jetted tub and balcony, and one bedroom with two twin beds. All four bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms.The cabin’s secluded location means you can spend your stay with just friends and family for company. But with the Telluride free gondola only a 50-yard walk from your front door, it’s also easy to access skiing, shopping and dining in both Mountain Village and downtown Telluride. If you’ll be visiting outside ski season, plan to tee off at the nearby Telluride Golf Course or take a day trip to the picturesque Alta Lakes.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Touch the Colorado wilderness while staying in impeccable comfort at this newly-built mountain villa. Offering towering windows, massive rooms and next-level facilities, guests will love the combination of fresh mountain air and rustic, timber-and-stone focussed decor. Relax in style on multiple balconies, experiencing great access to the renowned ski resort of Breckenridge and local wilderness.The towering, turret-like facade of this mountain retreat is liberally glazed with clear glass, helping guests to best take in the panorama of conifers and mountainside that stretches into the distance. Enjoy a fresh breakfast from the comfortable seats of the first and second floor balconies, spotting hawks and eagles gliding in the thermal currents, or spying the snowfall before setting out for the slopes. Guests can rest assured that the welcoming interior will offer coziness and entertainment, from bedroom fireplaces to a ping-pong table; room after room of spacious luxury awaits to be discovered.One of the most established communities in the Rockies, Breckenridge lies less than 10 minutes away from Doss Manor, offering excellent dining, brewery and shopping options, plus public Alpine gardens and several fascinating museums. The famous Peak ski runs of the resort stretch above, all within a few minutes drive. The trails and lakes of the locality offer mountain biking, canoeing and hiking in abundance, with great local golf courses, idyllic fishing on the Blue River, and the seasonal snow sculpture championships adding even more options, no matter the time of year. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Palm Springs is one of those highly desirable areas to live where the weather always seems to be perfect and its beautiful landscapes are decorated with houses designed by elite architects. Located in the Coachella Valley, Palm Spring features dynamic views of the mountain ranges that surround the valley from every direction. Sunset Terrace is an ideal home base for a golf vacation, with several amazing courses within a few miles.From the forties to the sixties, Palm Springs was the testing grounds for architects to perfect the mid-century modern style that this area is famously known for. Simple, yet sophisticated design and integration with nature are the cornerstones of the style, and of Sunset Terrace. The living spaces, both inside and out, are designed for functionality, and easy flow between each area. Inside, bright walls and high angled ceilings open the interior spaces. Colourful, minimalistic furniture reinforces the sixties inspired style, while the kitchen comes equipped with high end modern appliances and a very generous amount of countertop work space. Melding classic American architecture with touches of modern luxury make Sunset Terrace a truly amazing vacation home.Every inch of the terrace is designed with purpose. Like puzzle pieces, the salt-water pool and hot tub, bocce court, fire pit, and outdoor living and dining areas fit together perfectly. Out front, there’s a two car garage, and extra parking if needed. Inside you’ll find formal dining for ten, a wet bar, wine fridge, central air conditioning, and a fireplace. And, each of the five bedrooms has a Californian king bed, access to the terrace, and an ensuite bathroom.If you feel like exploring the area, the Indian Canyons, Palm Desert, and Joshua Tree National Park nature areas are all nearby. If you’d like a trip to the city, downtown Palm Springs is about a three minute drive away. And, if you’re a golfer, Mesquite, Escena, and Indian Canyon Golf Clubs are all within a few miles.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Palm Springs City ID: 3710

listing.listing_description: The perfect host for a multi-family ski vacation, Summit at Shockhill is ready to accommodate your group of twenty, with amenities that will satisfy the most discerning luxury vacationers. Located in the beautiful village of Breckenridge, just minutes from the downtown core, this villa will have you on the slopes or out to dinner in minutes. With ski-in/ski-out access to Mild Station Gondola, an eight-minute walk, you’ll have no trouble carving that first line into the snow every morning.Summit at Shockhill takes great pride in showing off its larger than life construction, proudly displaying massive timber framing, steel beams, rugged stone, and plenty of mountain-view framing glass. The interior benefits from a spacious, open concept layout, which helps to create an exciting social environment. The house is decorated with high-end electronics, designer furnishings, state of the art appliances, and a warm, inviting color scheme, making it the perfect place to relax and unwind after a long day of skiing.Your large group will have no problem finding spaces to come together as one or break away for more intimate moments during your stay at Summit at Shockhill. The formal dining area features seating for sixteen, with extra space at the wet bar and the kitchen’s breakfast bar. After dinner, guests will love lounging in the theatre room, game room, by the fireplace, and outside in the hot tub or by the fire pit. Summit at Shockhill has great tech features to help keep you connected, air conditioning, ski lockers, an office, and an elevator.After you’ve started a few ski sessions at Mild Station Gondola, an eight-minute walk, venture beyond to some of Breckenridge’s other ski access points. You’ll find Breckenridge Ski Resort, Peak 10, the Black Diamond Runs, and Copper Mountain, all within a few miles of Summit at Shockhill. When your day on the mountain comes to a close, head into the village, where you’ll find a wide range of dining options from fine dining at Hearthstone to the more casual Canteen, which features a great selection of craft beers.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Add sophisticated style to your ski holiday at Quandary Peak Penthouse 704. Beautifully appointed with an eye to contemporary glam, this spacious Colorado vacation rental has an open-plan layout and can sleep twelve in its four suite-style bedrooms. Convenient shared amenities at One Steamboat Place, mountain views and a location at the base of Steamboat Ski Resort round out the property’s charms.Guests of One Steamboat Place are invited to use the shared heated pool, hot tub, fitness center and winter shuttle service. Gather with family in the communal games room, or let the kids play in the Little Tykes room while the grown-ups enjoy a session in the wine tasting room or a massage in the spa. For entertaining in private, the penthouse has its own balcony with a barbecue and mountain views, as well as a media room.Vaulted ceilings, floor-to-ceiling windows and neutral tones give Quandary Peak Penthouse 704 a spacious feel and refined appeal. Soft hues of taupe, gray and gold give the open-plan living and dining areas a restful ambience that’s enhanced by the welcoming stone fireplace and broad dining table. The fully equipped kitchen is equally stylish and features a breakfast bar and Viking appliances.Each of the four bedrooms in this luxury villa has an en-suite bathroom for privacy and convenience. There are two bedrooms with king beds, mountain views and balconies, including a romantic master suite with its own gas fireplace. The other two bedrooms have a queen bed and two twin beds, respectively, and if you need more space, the media room has a queen bunk bed.A stay at Quandary Peak Penthouse 704 puts the incredible slopes and lively après-ski scene of Steamboat Springs at your doorstep. In the winter, you’re just steps from Steamboat Ski Resort; in the summer, you’re just a short drive from Rollingstone Ranch Golf Course and kayaking, fishing and rafting in the Yampa River. Be sure to make time for a soak in the area’s namesake springs, whether that’s the family-friendly Old Town or the honeymoon-worthy natural rock pools of Strawberry Park.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Located in between Shooting Star Golf Course, Jackson Hole Mountain Resort, and Teton Village, this luxuriously updated farmhouse enjoys incredibly scenic mountain views and convenient proximity to Jackson Hole’s most exciting attractions. Whether you’re visiting Wyoming to ski, golf, hike, or just enjoy the rugged mountain lifestyle, you’re sure to fall in love with Shooting Star Cabin’s authentic atmosphere and breathtaking surroundings. With accommodations for ten, this cabin is perfect for a family ski vacation, golf trip with friends, or an exciting retreat with colleagues.From the peaked roof to the barn board siding, down to the log and mortar, Shooting Star Cabin is quintessential Jackson. Inside, exposed wood, rugged stone, and a roaring fire set the tone for an unforgettable vacation experience. Mixed into the rustic-chic decor, you’ll find designer furniture, high-end electronics, and state of the art appliances, all sure to satisfy the most discerning luxury travelers. Throughout the cabin, you’ll find numerous mountain-view framing windows. If you’d like a closer look, head outside and relax in the hot tub while you gaze upon Wyoming’s rugged, natural beauty.When it’s time for dinner, Shooting Star’s formal dining area has seating for eight, and there’s extra space at the fully-equipped kitchen’s breakfast bar. The cabin is also outfitted with television, Wi-Fi, air conditioning, a barbecue, a washer/dryer, and more. The master bedroom features a king sized bed, a gas fireplace, and an en-suite bathroom with dual vanity, stand-alone shower, and bathtub.Jackson Hole Mountain Resort is one of America’s most celebrated ski destinations, and Shooting Star is just three minutes from its base. If you’d like to explore even more World-class skiing, Snow King Resort is only thirteen miles from home. Yellowstone National Park and Granite Hot Springs are also near enough for afternoon excursions, and if it’s your first time in Wyoming, they are a must-see. And, for vibrant mountain nightlife, Teton Village and the town of Jackson are great places spend a night out.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Pull into the grand driveway of this Santa Barbara home and anticipate the special quality of what awaits you; the pinnacle of modern living. The villa’s rich wooden floors, stone fireplace, tasteful living space and dream kitchen are complimented by a lush, lengthy garden and shady barbecue patio. Find yourself just a short drive from Santa Barbara harbor and the leisure of Butterfly Beach.From the moment you wake, the pleasures of this airy Californian villa will impress themselves on you. Balanced AC ensures that the ideal temperature is always present, as you walk into the futuristic, sleek and fully-outfitted kitchen. Emerge to the gentle breeze, swaying trees and pleasant warmth of the outdoor seating area, and choose a comfort seat under the broad sun shades. After a fun excursion to Santa Monica or nearby LA, return for lunch to the airy dining area that blurs the distinction between inside and outside. The home’s fully outfitted media room and sumptuous sitting room, complete with the hospitable glow of the regal fireplace, are ideal for relaxing as evening draws in.Situated close to the brilliant blue of the Pacific Ocean, Modern Serenity allows guests to get the absolute best from Santa Barbara. Experience all the delights of a beach day with some of the finest beaches in the region just a few kilometres away. Wile away a great day in the sunshine of Stearns Wharf and the nearby downtown, with a huge range of renowned restaurants, cafes and eateries to choose from. Guests are conveniently close to attractions like Santa Barbara zoo, while a huge range of highly rated golf clubs are just a very short drive from this ideally-located home. End the day in adventurous style with a drive into the scene Santa Ynez mountains to the north, where the golden hour illuminates stunning valleys and landmarks like the ruined stone mansion of Knapps Castle. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Welcome to the Redondo Beach Luxury villa, a gated home boasting 7,800 square feet with coastline views. Sitting high on the hillside and completely remodeled, this is one of our must-see California vacation rentals. Located just 20 miles from downtown Los Angeles, Redondo Beach’s magnificent views and sandy beaches have made it a favorite resort destination for well over a century.On hot days, cool off in the outdoor heated pool, surrounded by tropical rock decor as well as multiple waterfall features. Later, relax on comfy sun chaises looking out over the ocean. Movie lovers will appreciate the large theatre room with a projector screen and theatre-style seating, it’s made extra cozy thanks to a fireplace. Sports fan can play a little ball in the outdoor basketball court, or challenge one another to a game of pool or foosball.This home’s open space main living area offers natural light, marble floors, and is equipped with a large L-shaped sofa, comfy lounge chairs, a fireplace and balcony doors leading out to the terrace. This room also features a grand piano. A fully equipped kitchen is nearby, as is a casual dining area with plenty of seating.Up to 16 guests can be accommodated in the dwelling’s seven bedrooms. The king-sized master suite includes a sitting area, fireplace, windows overlooking the ocean as well as access to a terrace. You’ll also find an en-suite bathroom finished with marble tile, a walk-up hot tub, separate shower and his-and-her vanities. Two more rooms have king-sized beds, while others range from twins to queens. All bedrooms offer en-suites and most have televisions.Just steps away from the villa, you’ll find the amazing Redondo Beach. Golf enthusiasts will appreciate the short 15-minute drive to the Los Verdes golf course—the 2011 Los Angeles County Course of the Year winner. And shoppers can head to the Riviera Village for 300 plus shops, services and restaurants.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Get double the views from One Steamboat Place at Diamond Peak Penthouse 616. This luxury Steamboat Springs vacation rental looks out over both the breathtaking Yampa Valley and the base of Steamboat Ski Resort. With a slopeside location, ski-in, ski-out access and open-plan interiors designed for entertaining, the villa is perfect for a family reunion or a winter getaway with friends.Penthouse guests are welcome to use the shared outdoor pool and hot tub, fitness center, games room and other amenities at the exclusive One Steamboat Place community. Host a cookout on the villa’s private deck, which has a built-in barbecue, or serve refreshments from the wine cooler while gathering around the fireplace and flat-screen television for an easy night in.Diamond Peak Penthouse 616 is laid out around an open-plan great room with a sitting area, dining for eight and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar. Thoughtful touches like a stone fireplace surround and window seat lend a rustic, cozy feel, while original artwork selected by the villa’s owner adds pops of color.Invite up to twelve friends or family to Colorado for a comfortable holiday in the penthouse’s four bedrooms. There are two master suites with king beds, one room with two double beds, and one room with two bunk beds where kids will want to stake out their own space. All four bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms.With the gondola just an elevator ride away, access to the ski slopes from Diamond Peak Penthouse 616 is unrivaled. And complimentary shuttle service during the ski season makes it even easier to get around. In the summer, however, it’s still only a short drive to local attractions like the scenic fairways of Rollingstone Ranch Golf Course, the family-friendly pools at Steamboat Springs Old Town and the honeymoon-worthy natural rock formations and mineral waters at Strawberry Park.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Watch the lift lines and ski out at the perfect moment at Hayden Lodge 2206. Perfectly positioned above the Village Express chairlift, this Aspen Snowmass vacation rental gives you a front-row seat to the slopes. Its three bedrooms can accommodate six for a family holiday or a mountain getaway with friends in the heart of Snowmass Village.Guests are welcome to use the shared ski lockers, outdoor hot tub and children’s center at Hayden Lodge. The villa also has its own private balcony overlooking the chairlift, an underground parking spot and, for quiet evenings in, a TV, Wi-Fi, gas fireplace and wine fridge.After a day out in the Colorado mountains, gather around a contemporary stone and wood fireplace to relive your adventures or refuel at a dining table with seating for eight. The fully equipped kitchen, which has granite countertops and an inviting breakfast bar, makes it easy to pop in for a snack between runs or prepare a full après-ski feast.The villa has two bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms: one with a king bed and one with a queen bed, both with honeymoon-suite-worthy jetted tubs. The third bedroom has a queen bed and has access to a hall bathroom. For larger parties or those looking for more flexible accommodations, there’s also a queen sofa bed available.A stay at Hayden Lodge 2206 gives you the ultimate mountain luxury: ski-in, ski-out access to the slopes. Hop on the Village Express chairlift at your doorstep or make the short drive to neighboring ski areas including Buttermilk Mountain and Aspen Highlands. Find shopping, dining and nightlife in Snowmass Village, a 3-minute drive away, or in downtown Aspen.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Trickle Creek is a private luxury residence within the renowned One Steamboat Place, a stunning lodge and spa complex literally steps from Steamboat Gondola. With four bedrooms accommodating eight people, Trickle Creek is the ideal vacation rental for friends and families seeking a cozy home base while enjoying some of the finest Rocky Mountain slopes.The open-plan living area features a wall of glass doors gazing out on the Yampa Valley and Flat Top Mountains. The lounge is ideal for enjoying relaxing evenings together, with a cozy sectional couch and leather armchairs surrounding the wood-burning fireplace set within a gorgeous stone hearth, and the mounted flat screen television beside it. Hardwood floors, beautiful wooden furnishings, and a wonderful vintage print evoke classic Colorado tradition and charm. Beside the lounge, an elegant wood dining table seats ten in beautifully upholstered chairs, just off the fully equipped kitchen with its large breakfast bar for four. The glass doors from the living area open \ to a private balcony with Viking gas grill, ideal for evening barbeques.The bedrooms offer warm sanctuary for restful nights. The master bedroom features a king bed facing a fireplace set within a classic stone hearth, and its ensuite bathroom includes stand-alone steam shower and jetted bathtub. The second room features a queen bed and ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower and bathtub, while the third room has a queen bed and ensuite bathroom with shower/tub combo. Two double beds are in the fourth bedroom, with access to the bathroom in the hall.Beyond your private suite, you'll also enjoy access to the beautiful lodge areas of One Steamboat Place. When the ski suit comes off, take a restorative soak in the outdoor swimming pool and hot tub. And in the evening, kick back in the Great Room with its impressive stone fire place flanked by large, mountain-view windows.There may be no better location for enjoying the delights of Steamboat. To hit the slopes, the Steamboat Gondola is only a minute's walk away. For an idyllic day of golf, Rolling Stone Ranch Golf Course is within minutes by car. Strawberry Park Natural Hot Springs, like a deluxe spa in the heart of the forest, is also close by.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Buffalo Pass Residence, within the exclusive One Steamboat Place complex, offers luxurious privacy and classy mountain charm just a minute’s walk from the Steamboat slopes. In this beautifully designed, four-bedroom vacation rental, you’ll have the ideal home base to enjoy downtime with family friends between long days in the alpine air.From your suite's open plan living area, large windows look out at the valley and fill the interior with warm mountain light. The large, comfy sectional couch surrounds the wood-burning fire place and, beside it, flat screen television, making it the perfect lounge for family gathering and relaxation. The suite's rich wooden floors, beautiful rugs, warm and earthy color palette, and tasteful décor evoke classic Rocky Mountain and Southwest charm. The large, fully equipped kitchen features Viking Appliances, richly hued wood cabinetry, and a gorgeous island breakfast bar for four. There is also a work desk with iMac computer beside the living lounge. Heating and air conditioning will keep you comfortable in any season, and sliding glass doors open from the living area to the balcony, with barbeque and lounge furniture.The ample, cozy bedrooms will make you feel right at home, with their luxurious beds, soft carpeting, lovely natural light, and flat screen televisions for bedtime viewing. The master bedroom features king size bed and ensuite bathroom with stand-alone steam shower and stand-alone bath. There is also a second bedroom with king bed and ensuite bathroom with stand-alone rain shower and bathtub; a room with two double beds and access to the hall bathroom; and a room with two twin-over-double beds with ensuite bathroom—perfect for kids. The bedrooms are ideal for getting a deep night's rest before another awesome day on the slopes or trails.Buffalo Pass Residence guests have shared access to the heated outdoor swimming pool and hot tub, should those tried and tested muscles need a nice, restorative soak. When it's time to hit the slopes, you're a one-minute walk from Steamboat Gondola. City Market is just over a mile away, and Steamboat Old Town just three miles. After the thaw, dust off your woods and irons and head to the Rolling Stone Ranch Golf Course, less than two miles away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Live out your California dreams at a quintessentially L.A. home: Elegance Modern. This contemporary vacation rental is both chic and comfortable, with luxury amenities and a laid-back ambience. Perhaps best of all, its West Hollywood location is just minutes from museums, attractions, and shopping and dining in one of the city’s most vibrant neighborhoods.Relax in the sunshine with family and friends in a private backyard with a swimming pool, hot tub, plenty of loungers, an al-fresco living room and a fireplace. If you’ve been out exploring the city all day, serve refreshments from the wet bar or wine fridge and settle in for a screening in the home theater, or share photos of your holiday via Wi-Fi.With its free-flowing layout, neutral tones, colorful artwork and glam metallic accents, Elegance Modern epitomizes Los Angeles cool. A velour sofa and slipcovered chairs invite you to sit for a while in the open-concept living and dining area. The adjacent fully equipped kitchen has two islands, a breakfast nook and gorgeous stone countertops, as well as a host of gourmet appliances.There are three bedrooms in the villa’s main house and one in a guest house. In the main house, there are two bedrooms with king beds and en-suite bathrooms, and one bedroom with a double bed and access to a hall bathroom. The guest house is a honeymoon-worthy retreat with a king bed, en-suite bathroom and its own kitchen.From the villa’s setting in a residential neighborhood, it’s less than a 10-minute drive to shopping and entertainment at The Grove, the collection at the Los Angeles County Museum of Art and the iconic streets of Hollywood. Take the kids for a day out at Universal Studios, or chase more grown-up thrills in the tempting boutiques of Rodeo Drive, both within easy reach.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: It may be built out of logs, but there’s nothing cabin-like about this generously sized villa close to Avon. The lodge has 7,800 square feet of space, and it’s all rich in detail, whether the stonework over the fireplace or furnishings that mix prints with aplomb. It’s a 3-minute drive to Beaver Creek, which has both world-class skiing and a sweet tradition of daily chocolate chip cookies, too. If you’re planning a holiday in warmer weather, you can also plan to spend time on the lodge’s furnished deck, watching the barbecue or sitting down at the alfresco dining table for 8. If you’re planning a Colorado ski break, you may be more interested in the TV and projector, games room, Wi-Fi, and gas fireplace. This vacation rental makes a statement with its scale, from the portico at the entrance to the cathedral ceiling that soars over the great room. There’s ample room for friends and family in the living and dining rooms, separated by a double-sided fireplace. A breakfast bar and breakfast table mean there’s more seating in the fully equipped kitchen, and robin’s-egg-blue cabinets add style, too. The villa has 2 bedrooms with king beds, 1 bedroom with a queen bed, 1 bedroom with 2 twin beds, and 1 bedroom with 2 double bunk beds that’s ideal for parties traveling with a pack of children. All 5 bedrooms have private ensuite bathrooms. This luxury property is a 3-minute drive from skiing at Beaver Creek and all the activities at the resort base, from complimentary cookie time each day in the village to ice skating on the rink and seasonal Thursday night fireworks. Relive your honeymoon on a sleigh ride to dinner in a cozy cabin and arrange a snowshoe excursion through the forest that ends with wine and cheese. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: From the moment you walk through the gated entry, up the impressive drive and through the lanai at Kohola Point, it’s very evident you have reached a special destination. Perched cliffside and oceanfront in the secluded Anini Vista neighborhood, this 5,320 square foot home sleeps eight and overlooks the largest reef in Hawaii. It boasts 180-degrees of North Shore views — from the historic Kilauea Lighthouse to the romantic sunsets of Bali Hai.There are outdoor tables for alfresco dining, and a hammock sways invitingly between two palms, but it’s difficult to tear yourself away from the exquisite infinity pool with an octagonal spa with waterfalls that seem to spill out to the sea. At night this villa in Hawaii shines like a jewel on the shore.Each of the bedrooms features a separate entrance while three offer spectacular ocean views. The spacious master suite feature floor to ceiling windows on three sides, a spa-like master bath with outdoor shower, and is accessible through both the main living area and from the deck.In the modern kitchen, the large breakfast bar provides the perfect spot for a casual breakfast, while the outdoor kitchen and bar area is ideal for hosting your own private luau! The decor throughout is sleek and features rich ipé wood flooring. Nothing maximizes the enjoyment of this stellar setting like the incredible 3,000-square foot lanai.Kohola Point is 10 minutes from charming Hanalei Bay, and is located near both the Ke’e and Anini beaches, as well as world-class golfing at the Prince and Makai golf courses. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.TVR: 4210HAWAII TAX ID #: TA-013-894-0416-01

listing.listing_description: This beautiful modern loft is located near the heart of Park City, just a short walk from the ski resort's base and Historic Main Street. Balancing the rustic charm and comforts of a mountain chalet with the sophisticated style of Park City's contemporary scene, this 3,197-square-foot vacation rental is superbly appointed for a Rocky Mountain getaway. High-end amenities include a fully equipped gourmet kitchen and a fabulous rooftop terrace with open-air hot tub, deluxe barbeque station, and panoramic views. Boasting two master suites and a wonderful kids' bunk room sleeping six to eight children, the villa is ideal for two families.The home inspires cozy relaxation in every season—whether you're returning from the ski slopes, hiking trails, golf fairways, or Park City Film Festival. Savor an outdoor soak amid sublime vistas and fire up the barbeque for well-earned feasts. Dine alfresco in the warmer months and share a bottle of wine under the stars. In the wintertime, enjoy cozy evenings in the living room by the wood-burning fire, and gather around the lovely dining table for eight. The kitchen is fully equipped for the gourmet chef and features generous prep space. Air conditioning and heating ensure comfort year-round.There is one master suite on the second level of the home and one on the third. Each features a king bed, large TV, ample windows, and ensuite bathroom with shower and tub—with a charming wooden shutter revealing a window between the bed and bath. The kids' room includes two queen beds, each with dual twin beds lofted above, sleeping six to eight in total. This room enjoys easy access to the roof terrace, and its ensuite bathroom features a shower and tub.There is hardly a finer location in Park City for a family seeking that perfect balance of privacy and convenience. You're within easy walking distance of the ski slopes, Main Street, and Park Silly Sunday Market, while Park City Golf Course is just a five-minute drive away. Deer Valley is six minutes away by car, and several outstanding attractions are within five to ten miles, including Park City Ice Arena and Sports Complex.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: You can be close to the gondola and have room for ten at Horse Thief Mountain 103. This beautiful Colorado vacation rental boasts a location at One Steamboat Place that’s a short walk from Steamboat Ski Resort, and an open layout and four bedrooms with plenty of space for friends and family. Book a stay for a relaxed holiday with the whole group, or for a serious ski vacation you won’t soon forget.Villa guests are welcome to use the shared heated pool, hot tub, fitness center, games room, communal areas and more at One Steamboat Place. There’s a complimentary shuttle during the winter, concierge and ski valet service, a fabulous spa and even a Little Tykes room where kids can make friends their own age. A private balcony with a barbecue makes it easy to entertain at the villa, while the flat-screen television and fireplace will tempt you to stay in and cozy up.The thoughtfully appointed interiors of Horse Thief Mountain 103 can host a crowd without feeling crowded. The heart of this luxury villa is the open-plan great room, where a soft leather sectional in the sitting area angles around the fireplace and a rustic wood dining table seats eight. The adjacent fully equipped kitchen delights cooks with stainless steel Viking appliances and beckons diners with a breakfast bar.Each of the villa’s four bedrooms has an en-suite bathroom for privacy and convenience. There are two bedrooms with king beds: a master suite with its own gas fireplace and a second bedroom with a stand-alone bathtub to rival that in any honeymoon suite. The other two bedrooms have two twin beds and queen bunk beds, respectively.Horse Thief Mountain 103 is a 5-minute walk from Steamboat Ski Resort, where a gondola will whisk you up to trails that are some of the best in the West. It’s also close to shopping, dining and nightlife, in case you still have energy after a day on the slopes. In the summer, try out fishing, kayaking or rafting on the Yampa River, or test your skill in a gorgeous setting at Rollingstone Ranch Golf Course. For an only-in-Colorado treat, drive to the Old Town hot springs, which have family-friendly pools and waterslides, or Strawberry Park, where the naturally heated pools are set into rock formations.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Zirkel Mountain is a private luxury residence within One Steamboat Place, a complex of gorgeous suites and world-class lodge and spa amenities at the foot of Mt. Werner. With four bedrooms that sleep ten, Zirkel Mountain is just the classy sanctuary you need after adventurous days on the Steamboat slopes.With beautiful views of the surrounding valleys, the open-plan living room is an ideal space for spending evenings with family and friends. Relax in the lounge on the sumptuous sectional couch or supple leather armchairs, staying toasty by the wood-burning fire place and watching movies on the mounted flat screen television. Enjoy cooking in the fully equipped kitchen with Viking appliances, and fire up the Viking grill on the outdoor patio for some Southwest barbeque in the crisp air. At dinnertime, gather around the elegant wood dining table for ten. If you need to get some work done, there's even a small office and high-speed WiFi. Throughout the suite, the beautiful furnishings and tasteful, earthy décor evoke classic Colorado traditions.Three of the four bedrooms feature king size beds. The master room has its own gas fire place set inside a lovely stone hearth, and an ensuite bathroom with stand-alone rain shower and jetted tub. The second and third bedrooms also have ensuite bathrooms, one with shower/tub combo, one with stand-alone shower and tub. There's also a fourth room with a queen bed and double size bunk beds and access to the hallway bathroom.One Steamboat Place is renowned for its world-class lodge amenities. As guests at Zirkel Mountain, you'll enjoy complimentary access to its gathering areas, including the beautiful Great Room, the game parlor, and the Little Tykes room for kids. In the evening, after a long day on the slopes, slip into the outdoor hot tub and heated swimming pool for a delicious soak.In addition to being literally steps from the Steamboat Gondola, One Steamboat Place is perfectly situated to give you prime access to the Old Town and surrounding attractions. For golf in the alpine air, head to Rolling Stone Ranch Golf Course, just minutes away. And if those skiing muscles need some relief, head ten miles to Strawberry Park Natural Hot springs.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Dwell on Park Ave is a gorgeous luxury apartment in the heart of Old Town Park City. Enjoying a fantastic location just a block from Town Lift and a five-minute walk from Historic Main Street, the residence features close to 3,000 square feet of beautifully appointed private space, with exquisite living areas, a beautiful alfresco terrace including a private hot tub, and five superb bedroom suites accommodating twelve guests. For families, large groups of friends, and destination wedding guests seeking style, comfort, and convenience in the jewel of Utah, Dwell on Park Ave is an ideal choice.Built in 1920 and renovated in 2017, the villa combines classic alpine elegance with sophisticated contemporary style. Share a bottle of wine in the primary lounge by the fireplace, watching the game or your favorite shows on TV. Prepare meals in the fully equipped kitchen, and serve cocktails and hors d'oeuvres in den beside the dining area. Then gather around the lovely wood table for a hearty feast. At night, cuddle up with your favorite movies in the media room, with its sumptuous sofa, ample screen, and kitchenette with wet bar. Heating, air conditioning, an office space, a mud room, and excellent AV equipment including a sound system and Apple TV ensure the comfort of a home-away-from-home during your stay.The apartment's bedrooms are beautifully furnished and perfectly cozy, ideal for afternoon downtime and nights of deep rest between adventures. The master suite features a king bed and ensuite bathroom. There are two guest suites with queen beds, one with two double beds, and one with a twin-size bunk bed and a double-size bunk bed—perfect for kids.Dwell on Park Ave enjoys one of the finest possible locations for enjoying the skiing, hiking, dining, nightlife, and golf of Park City. You're just five minutes on foot from both Historic Main Street and Town Lift at Park City Resort, putting this entire world-class mountain at your fingertips. Park Silly Sunday Market and Park City Institute are also within easy walking distance, while Park City Golf Course is a little over a mile away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Discover a not-so-hidden gem of a resort at Treasure Mountain. One of the luxury private residences at the exclusive One Steamboat Place property, this beautifully appointed vacation rental offers sophisticated interiors and modern amenities just minutes from the nearest gondola at Steamboat Springs Ski Resort. Four bedrooms, a layout designed for entertaining and communal gathering spaces mean you can invite up to sixteen friends and family to share the ski holiday of a lifetime.All guests of One Steamboat Place are invited to use the resort’s shared pool, hot tubs, fitness center and games room. The younger set can play in the children’s center while the grown-ups hit the slopes, relax with a glass from the wine cellar in the tasting room or book a treatment at the renowned spa. If you’d prefer to entertain in a more intimate setting, the villa has its own deck with a barbecue, as well as an inviting open-plan great room.Rich colors, natural textures of stone and wood, and refined finishes define the resort’s aesthetic, and Treasure Mountain carries this out with a sophisticated, modern Western look. The living room, dining room and fully equipped kitchen are all part of the open great room, so guests can gather on the sectional around the gas fireplace, at the banquette by the dining table or at the breakfast bar and still carry on a conversation.The villa’s four bedrooms can easily accommodate groups of friends or family in a range of ages. There are two bedrooms with king beds and en-suite bathrooms, perfect for couples. The third bedroom, great for families, has a queen bed, queen bunk bed and a shared bathroom. Let the kids have their own space in the fourth bedroom, which has two double bunk beds, a twin bunk bed and a shared bathroom.Not only is it a 1-minute walk or ski from the villa to some of Colorado’s best slopes, the resort also has a complimentary seasonal shuttle. Make time during your stay for a visit to the town’s namesake springs, whether you take the family to the pools at Steamboat Springs Old Town or indulge in a honeymoon-worthy soak beneath the stars at Strawberry Park. If you’re visiting in the warmer months, book a time to try out the famously fast greens at the nearby Rollingstone Ranch golf course.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Mid-century chic meets comfortable mountain style at this chalet nestled into the valley below the San Juan peaks. The villa stretches out across three wings, offering wide-angle views of tree-lined slopes through its floor-to-ceiling windows, while a fireplace soars up to a cathedral ceiling in the great room. Drive 4 minutes to the heart of Mountain Village or the slopes of Telluride Ski Resort. After a day out playing in the Colorado mountains, retire to the furnished deck, which has a barbecue and views of the peaks. When there’s snow on the ground, serve refreshments from the wet bar and wine fridge inside, then gather friends and family close for the evening around the Apple TV, Wi-Fi, and gas fireplace. The central wing of this vacation rental is one long open-concept great room, with a high ceiling perched over a living area, dining table for 8, and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar. Blue and white ikat curtains and a matching area rug are delicate counterparts to the near-industrial metal and stone fireplace surround and clubby, cozy leather dining chairs. The villa has 2 bedrooms with king beds, private ensuite bathrooms, and honeymoon-suite-worthy details such as jetted tubs and fireplaces. There’s also 1 bedroom with a queen bed and 1 bedroom with 2 twin beds; these have access to hall bathrooms. For larger parties on holiday together, the TV room also has 2 twin daybeds. A stay at this luxury property puts you only a 4-minute drive from the Mountain Village downtown, where you’ll find shopping, dining, and a seasonal gondola or chondola offering transportation into Telluride; the Telluride Ski Resort base, where you can set off for the slopes; and, for summer visitors, the Telluride Golf Course. Drive 7.5 miles into downtown Telluride for a look at its historic downtown or a day out at one of its festivals. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: With walking access to Mid Station Gondola, you’ll have no trouble hitting the slopes bright and early at this ultra-luxurious mountain home away from home. Perfect for larger groups, Chalet du Soleil is ideal for family ski vacations, golf trips, or exciting corporate retreats. With Breckenridge’s vibrant Main Street and historic district nearby, your group will have everything they need within a few minutes while enjoying the chalet’s exceptional level of privacy.Named for its ability to capture sunny mountain views, Chalet du Soleil lets you enjoy dynamic vistas from nearly every room, and especially from the massive windows in the great room. The other focal point of the spacious living area is the stone fireplace, which shows off Soleil’s authentic and rugged building materials. Rich wood, iron fixtures, intricate stonework, and plush designer furniture deliver a warm, welcoming atmosphere that feels just right after a long day on the mountain. Thoughtfully integrated into the rustic-chic environment, you’ll find state of the art electronics and restaurant-caliber appliances. Soleil also has a few bonus features, like the home theatre room, entertainment bar, office, and reading nook, which will help everyone in your large group find their own space to enjoy an unforgettable getaway.Outside, Soleil has a three-car garage that is also great for storing wet ski gear. Follow the expansive deck around the property, and you’ll see incredible views of the mountains from many angles. You’ll also find the hot tub, barbecue, and several furnished outdoor sitting areas on the deck.After you’ve spent a day on the slopes, head into town for an exciting evening on Breckenridge’s Historic Main Street. You’ll find plenty of local bars and restaurants, breweries, and nightlife establishments on Main Street, and the scene in Breckenridge is buzzing all year-round. In the warmer months, golf, river rafting, hiking, rock climbing, and zip-line tours are great ways to get out and see this beautiful part of Colorado.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Steamboat Springs is truly a “ski town” in every way. From the tops of the mountain, to the chalets, and throughout the vibrant downtown, if you love skiing, you’ll love Steamboat. And, Sage Creek is right at the heart of it all. Less than a minute away from the Steamboat Gondola, this luxury rental will have you at the top of the mountain in a flash.Warm, cozy, and with a slope side view, after a long day of skiing you’ll love the inviting atmosphere of Sage Creek. Curl up on the comfortable couch in front of the beautiful stone fireplace. Relax and watch a movie with the family, or invite some friends for dinner, there’s lots of space. With hard wood flooring, earthy tones, and a ski lodge ambience, Sage Creek incorporates rustic charm into its luxurious features. Moving into the kitchen you’ll find gourmet appliances, stainless steel fixtures, and plenty of functional countertop workspace. Burgundy cabinetry adds a nice pop of colour to the kitchen’s portion of the open concept great room. An ideal social space for the whole family, Sage Creek’s great room is just where you’ll want to be after a day on the slopes.Another relaxing attraction at Steamboat Resort is the heated outdoor pool and hot tub, to which you’ll have shared access. On Sage Creek’s balcony you’ll find cozy outdoor furniture, great for an alfresco meal cooked on the barbecue. Inside, there’s formal dining for ten, and an extra few spots at the kitchen breakfast bar. And, if you feel like staying connected to the rest of the world, there’s Wi-Fi, a flat screen television, and a DVD player in the living room.If you’re feeling like taking a break from skiing, Steamboat Springs has lots of other great attractions. Rolling Stone Ranch Golf Course is a great way to take in some of the scenic views of this dynamic mountain landscape.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please note that this home is in close proximity to a construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.Double the fun on your ski holiday at Falconhead Lodge South. Designed with two families in mind, this luxury Steamboat Springs vacation rental features two living rooms, two kitchens, plenty of entertaining space and five bedrooms on three floors. Enjoy the gorgeous mountain setting right from the villa, where large windows frame breathtaking views, or by making the short drive to some of the best skiing in Colorado.You’ll enter Falconhead Lodge South on the top level, where a heated garage and storage room with built-in lockers provide plenty of space for all your outdoor gear. On warm evenings, you can take in the views of the Yampa Valley from the private deck and terrace, which have a barbecue, dining area and hot tub. In cooler weather, take the stairs or elevator to the sports bar and rec room area on the lower level, which has a wet bar, pool table and flat-screen television.This villa is mountain living on a grand scale, demonstrated by the four-story window that follows a timber-and-steel staircase through the house. Stone walls and wood floors give the living spaces the warmth of a traditional ski lodge, while pops of color in the furnishings are bright, modern touches. Two living rooms and two fully equipped kitchens can both accommodate and feed a crowd, and there’s plenty of seating at the formal dining area and the breakfast bar.Five bedrooms, each with an en-suite bathroom, make this residence a wonderful alternative to a hotel for larger parties. There are three bedrooms with king beds, one with a queen bed and one with three bunk beds. For a special occasion such as a family reunion, anniversary celebration or even a snowy destination wedding, the villa’s North counterpart can also be reserved.Once nicknamed Ski Town USA, Steamboat Springs has a variety of challenging runs. The nearest are just 5 minutes away at Steamboat Ski Resort, but the Thunderhead lift is also an easy 3-mile drive from the villa. Don’t miss the area’s namesake springs, from the kid-friendly Steamboat Springs Old Town to the honeymoon-worthy Strawberry Park. And in summer, the nearby Rollingstone Ranch course will provide hours of fun for avid golfers.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please note that this home is in close proximity to a construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.Take your family reunion or anniversary celebration to the mountains at Falconhead Lodge North. Set above Colorado’s Yampa Valley, with views of the Steamboat Ski Resort, this luxury vacation rental features incredible views and a convenient location close to skiing, golf and more. The incredible interiors are designed for entertaining, from the double living rooms and kitchens to your very own sports bar and five suite-style bedrooms.Leave your car in the heated garage and your gear in the dedicated storage room of this multi-level Steamboat Springs home. Enjoy a favorite show—or the big game—on the flat-screen television, serve refreshments from the wet bar and set up a friendly competition around the pool table. For quieter evenings, there’s a cozy fireplace. And for warmer weather, the home opens to a private deck and terrace with a barbecue, dining table and hot tub.The heart of Falconhead Lodge North is a spacious open-plan great room with a sitting area laid out around the fireplace, a dining table that seats twelve, and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar for quick snacks or kids’ meals. A separate second living room and kitchen make it easy to accommodate a crowd. Throughout the home, natural tones connect the interiors to the mountain landscape, and wood-trimmed windows frame unforgettable views.Each of the villa’s five bedrooms has an en-suite bathroom, making it a great alternative to a hotel or resort for a ski holiday with a group. There are four bedrooms with king beds and one bedroom with three bunk beds. The lodge’s southern half can also be reserved, for a property that’s large enough to host a retreat or even an intimate destination wedding.Falconhead Lodge North is just a 5-minute drive from Steamboat Ski Resort. If you can’t get enough of the slopes, make the 3-mile trip to the Thunderhead ski lift. Don’t miss a playful afternoon at Steamboat Springs Old Town or a honeymoon-worthy evening at the Strawberry Park hot springs. In warmer weather, Rollingstone Ranch Golf Club offers challenging greens amid beautiful scenery.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This extraordinary Napa Valley luxury estate is situated in a secluded setting about two miles from downtown Sonoma. Featuring spectacular outdoor and indoor living spaces, beautiful vineyard views, and room for eighteen guests (ten adults and eight children), Lomita Estate gives families, friends, and destination wedding guests a unique yet quintessential experience of California's world-famous wine country.The beautifully landscaped estate is ideal for celebrating momentous occasions or merely relaxing in the open air. Enjoy enchanting hours in the Mediterranean gardens, with their classical statuary, lush lawns, lovely fruit trees, and bocce court. Savor cool drinks around the fabulous swimming pool, bathing in the hot tub as the kids leap from the Lion King-inspired stone promontory. In the afternoon, gather in the outstanding alfresco pavilion, cooking pizza and barbeque at the outdoor kitchen, sipping Napa wine in the lounge, and sitting down for an unforgettable feast.Indoors, the house features multiple living rooms, dining areas, and a charming game room, creating the ideal space for dinner party soirés or intimate evenings with family. The large and luminous kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances, a perfect laboratory for the talented cooks among you. There is a beautiful dining table for ten in the open-plan living room, as well as a lovely sunroom with a circular table beneath vaulted ceilings. The villa's décor is exquisite throughout, with superb artwork and stylish touches of rusticity that evoke a classic Sonoma elegance.The main house includes six bedrooms, while the pool pavilion has a queen bedroom on its lower level. The master suite features a king bed, views of the garden and pool, and an ensuite bathroom with dual vanity, stand-alone rain shower, and bathtub. Two of the guestrooms have king beds and one has a queen bed. Each of the two kids' rooms has one twin-size bunk bed and one double-size bunk bed.Lomita Estate is ideally situated for exploring the cultural and natural riches of Napa Valley. You're only about a mile down the road from a local winery, and two miles from downtown Sonoma. Bouverie Wildflower Preserve and Glen Ellen and Sonoma Valley Regional Park are both within minutes by car, and downtown Napa is just fifteen miles away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: A consistent host of international ski competitions, it’s no wonder so many Olympic skiers call Steamboat Springs home. The Elk Mountain residence at One Steamboat place offers an amazing view of the entire valley, and it’s located right by the resort's main gondola.After an exciting day on the slopes, return to Elk Mountain for a relaxing evening with family and friends. With a fully equipped kitchen and a barbeque on the balcony, preparing meals is easy. Formal dining for ten, an open concept living room, and a beautiful fire place create a comfortable environment for the whole family. If you still need a little more excitement, head to the resort’s shared pool and hot tub for a late night dip.What comes to mind when you picture a classic ski lodge? Probably wood floors, a stone fireplace, comfortable leather furniture, and a warm and cozy atmosphere, right? That’s exactly Elk Mountain’s ambience, and then some. Top of the line stainless steel appliances, bright modern lighting fixtures, and colorful cabinetry give the kitchen an element of style. Elegant décor gives the villa a touch of luxury, while staying true to its rustic roots. And, large windowed doors open to the balcony and the spectacular mountain view.The décor of the living room continues in to Elk Mountain’s bed and bathrooms. The master has a king sized bed, walk-in closet, fireplace, and an ensuite with a steam shower, bathtub, and dual vanity. The three other bedrooms feature a king, two doubles, and two bunk beds, and all of them have ensuite bathrooms.Near the resort you’ll find restaurants and shopping in Steamboat Springs Old Town, a charming part of the city to spend an afternoon exploring. Come summer, book a tee time at Rolling Stone Ranch Golf Course, another great way to take in even more of this area’s breathtaking scenery.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Capture incredible city views from this scenic perch in the prestigious Hollywood Hills neighborhood, steps north of Sunset Boulevard. On quiet nights, stretch out on the sofa and binge a new series. If it’s a party you’re after, bring in a private chef, so you’re free to mingle with guests on the multiple balconies and indoor/outdoor lounge spaces. Then, walk the group out to the bars on Sunset.Soothing cream-tones and the lush greenery of California are a classic combination. Levels shows off exactly what you’re after in an authentic Hollywood Hills home. Pick the perfect outdoor spot to read in the shade, work on your tan, or gather with friends. Inside, find solitude in the master’s spa-like soaking tub. Schedule an important meeting in the office area. And, celebrate with a drink at the kitchen’s bar.Levels makes it easy to escape the downtown atmosphere outside with its 4-spaces garage, secluded backyard, and rooftop terrace. If you feel like doing a little cooking yourself, the fully equipped kitchen has everything you’ll need. And, the breakfast bar adds a social element to meal prep. After a casual dinner, gather around the fireplace to discuss plans for the next day in Los Angeles.For family fun, Universal Studios, Disneyland, and LA Zoo are always winners. Rather a day on the beach? Santa Monica Pier, Venice, and the beaches of Malibu are all with a short drive. If you’d prefer to do your exploring inland, Topanga State Park is full of scenic hiking trails. And, within minutes you could visit Rodeo Drive, The Grove, and downtown LA for world-class shopping.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
